scripts.test: SENECA_DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:18000 lab -v -L  -t 50 -P '\.test' test -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html -I AggregateError,atob,btoa,AbortController,AbortSignal,EventTarget,Event,MessageChannel,MessagePort,MessageEvent,performance
scripts.test-msgs: lab -t 50 -P messages.test -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --access public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && npm run repo-publish-quick
